evidence.method: Gene expression correlated with compound production

products.name: C15-gramicidin (gramicidin A)
products.comment: Gramicidin synthetase is organized in four multifunctional enzymes composed of 2; 4; 6; and 4 modules, respectively. By contrast to the existing MIBiG entry BGC0000367, the gene cluster for synthesis of gramicidin synthetase is complete (lgrABCD) and should be used for replacing the gene cluster from Brevibacillus brevis NBRC100599 (lgrABC). Brevibacillus brevis ATCC8185 (GB AJ566197.1) has exactly the same domain structure.
